review: Love!!!  I am able to observe what my children watch.  The convenience of prime is nice.  And renting from home is the best.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I heard great things about this product, my boyfriend has the fire tv box one & I really wish I would have purchased this instead of the Google chrome cast one.
author: Angelica

review: i was excited to recieve this in the mail today.  But, hooking it up was a disappointment.  If you have Comcast as your cable provider, neither the HBOGo app nor the Showtime Anywhere app will work.  Comcast is not supported as a cable provider.  I was looking forward to using this to watch HBO, Showtime, Netflix and Amazon Prime movies.  Having only 50% of my expectations met has me wondering if I should just return this.7/22/15 - I learned today that Comcast has reached an agreement with Amazon about supporting the Fire Stick.  I'm going to try this tonight and if it works, I will be a happy camper.7/23/15 - Well, Starz, HBO and Showtime are now available, but History, A&E;, etc. are still not.  So, my review stands as is.
author: Jon V. "Jon Vogel"

review: Really disappointed about the stick, slow, reduced in apps...
author: DAVID
